overview:
Nick likes to make things easier and more fun for people. Life is hard enough, right?

He looks at ‘stuff’ that is hard, complicated and a pain in the arse and apply’s something that is becoming increasing rare in this world………..common sense.

Nick has experience in applying common sense and making bullsh*t invisible for the good of all.

His goal is to do good stuff in the world, that others also regard as good stuff. (Go analyse that Dr. Comfy Couch!!)

Nick is Managing Director of get-ctrl

24 years sales and marketing experience, 15 years technology focused. Global team leader achieving revenue targets in excess of $50 million per annum. Managed bands, organised music events, promoted large scale live gigs. Member of the music managers forum. A regular speaker at industry events and universities on the ‘new music business’. Music lover. Aspiring guitarist but for now collecting them fuels the passion.
